p: Diarrhea is a main public health concern that causes high mortality, especially among children. Apart from orthodox medicine, the use of herbal drugs in the treatment of diarrhea disorder is a common practice in many developing countries including Ethiopia. 23 The medicinal value of the plant depends on the amount and purity of chemical constituents, which can be affected by different factors, such as climate condition, soil nutrient, method of preparation, and parts of the plant used. 24
